title: OO Content development
content:
This topic provides content developers with guidelines for developing new operations for Operations Orchestration (OO). Operations are used to create new flows to execute inside Operations Orchestration's flow execution engine.

To create new content, build an extension and deploy it to OO Central or Workflow Designer. An extension is an artifact that contains actions written in Java,  .NET, or python.

Actions are code blocks used to create new operations for OO in Advanced Flow Language (AFL) or CloudSlang language.
